A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The effects are great\, the actors are good\, the Luke+Rey scenes were wonderfully engrossing\, the writing...was not. I enjoyed myself while I was in the theater watching it but as soon as I walked out and my brain engaged most of that enjoyment melted away like ice on a summer sidewalk. Everything I enjoyed was a sudden twist or unexpected event that makes no sense when I think about it. No re-watch appeal.
